item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计的美国用户无法使用马斯克的 X 系统
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，埃隆-马斯克的 X 系统周三在美国有数千用户停机。【原文：Elon Musk's X was down for thousands of users in the U.S. on Wednesday, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 小米首席执行官表示，小米将考虑从 2027 年起在中国以外地区销售汽车
item.description: 中国小米公司首席执行官雷军在周三的一次直播中表示，从 2027 年起，这家从智能手机制造商转型为电动汽车制造商的公司将考虑在中国境外销售汽车。【原文：China's Xiaomi will consider selling cars outside China from 2027, Lei Jun, CEO of the smartphone turned electric vehicle maker, said during a livestream on Wednesday.】

item.title: 洞察：延误喷气式飞机交付的航空座椅行业危机内幕
item.description: 威尔士一家工厂的豪华商务舱座椅扶手下藏着一条线索，它揭示了全球航空业的瓶颈，许多航空公司正焦急地等待新喷气式飞机。【原文：Tucked beneath the armrest of a luxury business class seat in a factory in Wales lies a clue to a global aviation bottleneck that has left many airlines waiting impatiently for new jets.】

item.title: 比亚迪越野品牌方成宝为华为辅助驾驶系统提供优惠
item.description: 中国电动汽车制造商比亚迪旗下的方成宝品牌周三在社交媒体上发文称，华为乾坤高级驾驶系统套餐限时优惠20,000元（2,790.33美元）。【原文：Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD's Fangchengbao brand is offering a limited-time 20,000 yuan ($2,790.33) discount for the Huawei Qiankun Advanced Driving System package, Fangchengbao said in a social media post on Wednesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉季度交付量大幅下降，超过分析师预期
item.description: 特斯拉周三报告称，由于激烈的竞争和首席执行官埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政治立场遭到反弹，其老化的电动汽车产品线的全球需求受到打击，第二季度交付量大幅下降，降幅超过预期。【原文：Tesla reported a sharper-than-expected fall in second-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, as intense competition and backlash against CEO Elon Musk's political stance hit global demand for its aging electric-vehicle lineup.】

item.title: 据《西雅图时报》报道，微软将裁员多达 9000 人
item.description: 据《西雅图时报》周三报道，微软将裁员多达 4%，约 9100 人，这是自 2023 年以来最大规模的一轮裁员。【原文：Microsoft is laying off as much as 4%, or roughly 9,100, of its employees in the largest round of job cuts since 2023, the Seattle Times reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 独家报道文件显示，谷歌为避免欧盟反垄断罚款提出新建议
item.description: 据路透社看到的一份文件显示，Alphabet 旗下的谷歌公司已提议对其搜索结果进行新的修改，以抵御来自竞争对手越来越多的批评。【原文：Alphabet's Google has proposed fresh changes to its search results in an attempt to fend off growing criticism from rivals, a week before a key meeting that could lead to yet another EU antitrust fine, according to a document seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 印度 Max Financial 公司报告其部门受到网络威胁
item.description: 印度 Max Financial Services 公司周三表示，其子公司 Axis Max Life Insurance 收到了匿名发件人关于未经授权访问客户数据的通信。【原文：India's Max Financial Services said on Wednesday its unit, Axis Max Life Insurance, received communication on unauthorized access to customer data from an anonymous sender.】

item.title: 美国利率期货提高 7 月宽松押注，9 月全面降价
item.description: 周三的联邦基金利率期货提高了在 7 月份的政策会议上降息的可能性，因为 6 月份的私营部门就业报告远远低于预期。【原文：Futures on the federal funds rate on Wednesday lifted the chances of a rate cut by the July policy meting after a much weaker-than-expected private sector jobs report for June.】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，以帕尔默-卢基为首的科技富豪将创办新银行，与 SVB 竞争
item.description: 英国《金融时报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，由 Anduril 联合创始人帕尔默-卢基（Palmer Luckey）领导的一群科技亿万富翁正在发起一家新的以加密货币为重点的美国银行，以填补硅谷银行倒闭后留下的空白。【原文：A group of tech billionaires led by Anduril co-founder Palmer Luckey are launching a new crypto-focused U.S. bank to fill the void left by Silicon Valley Bank's collapse, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 关税打击需求，Rivian 公布季度交付量下降 22
item.description: Rivian Automotive 周三报告称，由于激烈的竞争和关税导致的经济不确定性，其电动汽车的需求受到打击，第二季度交付量大幅下降。【原文：Rivian Automotive reported a sharp fall in second-quarter deliveries on Wednesday, as demand for its electric vehicles takes a hit from stiff competition and tariff-driven economic uncertainty.】

item.title: 美国冻结加征关税到期后墨西哥比索将下滑
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，在美国对其他国家加征关税的临时冻结措施于下周到期后，反弹的墨西哥比索将在未来几个月内下滑。【原文：The rallying Mexican peso is set to slip in the coming months after a temporary freeze on U.S. tariff hikes against other countries expires next week, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 美国 6 月私营部门就业人数意外减少；裁员人数仍然较少
item.description: 本周三发布的《ADP全国就业报告》显示，6月份美国私营企业就业人数意外下降，上个月的就业增幅也小于最初的预期。【原文：U.S. private payrolls unexpectedly fell in June and job gains in the prior month were smaller than initially thought, the ADP National Employment Report showed on Wednesday.】

item.title: 去美元化迹象显现，新兴市场债务销售激增不惧全球动荡
item.description: 银行家们告诉路透社，今年上半年，新兴市场的债务销售蓬勃发展，无视关税发脾气、导弹袭击和油价波动，有望再创新高--而且有迹象表明，新兴市场正在摆脱美元的影响。【原文：Emerging market debt sales boomed in the first half of the year, defying tariff tantrums, missile attacks and gyrating oil prices, on track for another year of records - and with nascent signs of a shift away from the dollar, bankers told Reuters.】

item.title: 马士基估计目前美国的有效关税平均为 21
item.description: 丹麦航运集团马士基公司周三表示，该公司估计其实际支付的美国进口关税平均为集装箱装载量的21%，不到华盛顿4月份暂停征收全面关税前的一半。【原文：Maersk estimates companies pay effective U.S. import tariffs of on average 21% relative to container load, the Danish shipping group said on Wednesday, less than half the rate before Washington paused its sweeping tariffs in April.】

item.title: 美元将继续受到关税、债务和降息预期的压力：路透调查
item.description: 路透社（Reuters）对外汇分析师进行的一项调查预测，美元在未来几个月将继续疲软，因为美国债务问题日益严重，关税政策反复无常，降息预期不断升温。【原文：The U.S. dollar will remain weak over the coming months, a Reuters poll of FX analysts forecast, caught in a tangle of mounting U.S. debt concerns, erratic tariff policies and rising interest rate cut expectations.】

item.title: 巴西央行称 C&M 软件遭受网络攻击
item.description: 巴西中央银行周三表示，技术服务提供商 C&M Software 报告其基础设施遭到网络攻击。【原文：Brazil's central bank said on Wednesday that technology services provider C&M Software reported a cyberattack on its infrastructure.】

item.title: 英伟达™（Nvidia）夺回 6 月份市值榜首位置
item.description: 6 月份，英伟达（Nvidia）蝉联全球估值最高的公司榜首，原因是人们对其在人工智能领域的领先地位重新产生了乐观情绪，并预期对其人工智能芯片的需求将激增。【原文：Nvidia reclaimed the top spot among the most valued companies worldwide in June, as its shares were supported by renewed optimism over its leadership in artificial intelligence and expectations of surging demand for its AI chips.】

item.title: 淡水河谷下调 2025 年铁矿石团块产量预期
item.description: 巴西矿商淡水河谷周三下调了对2025年铁矿石团块产量的预测，从之前预计的3800万至4200万吨下调至3100万至3500万吨之间。【原文：Brazilian miner Vale on Wednesday lowered its forecast for iron ore agglomerates production in 2025 to a range between 31 million and 35 million metric tons, from a previous estimate of 38 million to 42 million tons.】

item.title: 爱尔兰部长表示，美国对与欧盟开展医药贸易的 "创新解决方案 "持开放态度
item.description: 哈里斯周三表示，美国贸易代表贾米森-格里尔（Jamieson Greer）在上个月与爱尔兰贸易部长西蒙-哈里斯（Simon Harris）的会晤中明确表示，华盛顿对美国与欧盟之间药品贸易的 "创造性解决方案 "持开放态度。【原文：U.S. Trade Representative Jamieson Greer made clear in a meeting with Irish Trade Minster Simon Harris last month that Washington was open to "creative solutions" on pharmaceutical trade between the U.S. and European Union, Harris said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，Netflix 与 Spotify 就扩展电视直播内容举行会谈
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周三援引知情人士的话报道，Netflix 已与 Spotify 就音乐颁奖礼或现场音乐会系列等项目进行谈判，作为其电视直播业务的一部分。【原文：Netflix has held talks with Spotify to partner on projects such as music award shows or live concert series as part of its live TV push, the Wall Street Journal reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 早间竞标：最后期限？什么最后期限？
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的关键所在。【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today.】

item.title: 投资者关注贸易协议和薪资数据，期指寸步走高
item.description: 华尔街股指期货周三走高，原因是投资者在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）设定的7月9日最后期限前关注美国贸易谈判，并期待薪资数据为货币政策路径提供线索。【原文：Wall Street stock index futures edged higher on Wednesday, as investors monitored U.S. trade negotiations ahead of President Donald Trump's July 9 deadline and looked ahead to payrolls data for clues on the monetary policy path.】

item.title: 美国经济衰退风险缓解，施罗德上调全球企业债券评级
item.description: 施罗德（Schroders）周三将其对全球公司债券的展望从 "负面 "上调至 "中性"，并维持其对全球股市的积极看法，因为它预计美国经济衰退的风险将降低。【原文：Schroders upgraded its outlook for global corporate bonds to 'neutral' from 'negative' on Wednesday and maintained its positive view on global equities as it expects reduced risks of a U.S. recession.】

item.title: 荷兰气候技术公司 Dexter Energy 融资 2300 万欧元
item.description: 总部位于阿姆斯特丹的气候技术公司Dexter Energy周三表示，该公司已通过一轮融资筹集了2300万欧元（2710万美元），用于扩展其人工智能驱动的可再生能源和电池服务。【原文：Dexter Energy, an Amsterdam-based climate tech firm, has raised 23 million euros ($27.1 million) via a funding round to expand its AI-driven services for renewable energy and batteries, the company said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）对约 29.9 万辆斯泰兰特汽车展开召回调查
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局周三表示，在接到有关换挡杆电缆衬套故障的投诉后，该局对克莱斯勒母公司斯泰兰特公司的约29.9万辆汽车展开了召回调查。【原文：The U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Wednesday it opened a recall query into about 299,000 vehicles from Chrysler parent Stellantis , after receiving complaints about faulty shifter cable bushings.】

item.title: 派拉蒙公司董事包括莎莉-雷德斯通（Shari Redstone）面临反对连任的建议
item.description: 派拉蒙全球公司（Paramount Global）正在等待监管部门批准与 Skydance Media 合并，其股东将于周三决定是否重新选举四名董事，此前有建议反对他们重返公司董事会。【原文：Shareholders of Paramount Global , which is waiting for regulatory approval to merge with Skydance Media, will decide Wednesday whether to re-elect four directors, following a recommendation to oppose their return to the company's board.】

item.title: 特朗普减税计划重返美国众议院，共和党人对议案意见不一
item.description: 参议院在就该法案的高昂价格进行激烈辩论后，以最微弱的优势通过了该法案。众议院也存在类似分歧，共和党以220:212的优势控制了众议院。【原文：The Senate passed the legislation by the narrowest possible margin after intense debate on the bill's hefty price tag. Similar divides exist in the House, which Republicans control by a 220-212 margin.】

item.title: Stellantis 寻求更多时间以达到欧盟关于多用途车的二氧化碳排放目标
item.description: 斯特兰蒂斯汽车公司负责扩大欧洲业务的让-菲利普-伊姆巴拉托（Jean-Philippe Imparato）周三表示，该公司正在寻求将欧洲更严格的货车二氧化碳排放规定延长五年。【原文：Automaker Stellantis is seeking a five-year extension to tighter European rules on CO2 emissions for vans, said Jean-Philippe Imparato, responsible for Enlarged Europe, on Wednesday.】

item.title: 他们尝试过 "美国制造"--但对客户来说太贵了
item.description: 美国中小型制造商面临着一个选择，要么对中国进口商品支付高额关税，要么承担大幅提高的国内生产成本。【原文：Small and midsize American manufacturers face a choice between paying steep tariffs on Chinese imports or taking on significantly higher domestic production costs.】
